{{cpp/chrono/year/title|operator+|operator-}}
{{cpp/chrono/year/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
constexpr std::chrono::year operator+() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr std::chrono::year operator-() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Applies the unary operators to the year value.
@1@ Returns a copy of {{c|*this}}.
@2@ Returns a {{tt|year}} whose year value is the negation of that of {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|*this}}
@2@ {{c|std::chrono::year(-int(*this))}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::chrono::year y{2020};
    constexpr auto ny = -y;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "The year " &lt;&lt; (int)y &lt;&lt; " negated is " &lt;&lt; (int)ny &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
The year 2020 negated is -2020
}}
